text: Pick up prices are really good! Service was fast and friendly. Pizza is piping hot and delicious. Love the flavored crust! We had a veggie and a Howie Maui. Yum!

text: Very disappointed with the pasta I got. Have ordered there spaghetti before and it was delicious. But they have changed to panini pasta and it is half the size. And the chicken caesar salad was very dissatisfied as well. Will definitely not be going back there again. ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨
